texts.en: Aleta is 44 years old and married with one child. She has a large cattle farm and to earn extra income she also runs a taxi service. She has been doing this for eight years. Aleta needs a loan to buy four young calves, barbed wire and iron poles, and also four new tires and a new paint job for her taxi. She has been a member of SPBD since 2006. Aleta will use the profits from her sales to pay for her family's weekly expenses and help with the renovation of her house.

loans.use: to buy four young calves, barbed wire and iron poles, and also four new tires and a new paint job for her taxi.

loans.name: Monica

texts.es: Monica es soltera y no tiene hijos, ella vive en El alto en una casa de ladrillo donde paga un alquiler Monica es comerciante de productos alimenticios y necesita un credito para incrementar su mercaderia como refrescos, pan, arroz, galletas, dulces, etc. Monica no tiene a nadie que le ayude en su negocio y no tiene familiares que puedan colaborar con ella en el aspecto economico por eso pide su ayuda
texts.en:
Monica is single and has no children. She lives in a rented brick house in El Alto.

Monica is a merchant who sells food products. She needs a loan in order to increase her inventory of merchandise with items such as soft drinks, bread, rice, cookies, sweets, and other products. Monica has no one who can help her with her business. In addition, she has no relatives who she can rely on financially. For this reason, she is requesting assistance.

loans.use: to buy soft drinks, bread, rice, cookies, sweets, and other products.

loans.name: Kashif

texts.en:
Kashif, 35 years old, is a young and energetic person living in the area of Lahore, Pakistan. He is the father of two children and sells clothes in his community. This clothing shop is the only source of income for his family. This is the reason he devotes all his time and commitment to this clothing shop.

His shop is situated in the clothing market and due to many retailers, competition is very high. Due to this competition it is very difficult to convince customers for a high price, so retailers do not have more bargaining power. This competition has led to lower sales and less turnover. He has to maintain the latest designs, rates and delightful colors of clothing in his shop so that he can maintain the rate of sales.

Now the major problem is that the Eid festival is about to come and he does not have sufficient cash on hand to buy clothing for the summer season.

Therefore, Kashif has requested a loan from Kiva’s field partner BRAC Pakistan so that he can be empowered to buy a variety of clothing for the summer season.

Kashif hopes that he will purchase clothing according to customer demand at the right time so he can cope with the market competition and could earn some good profits as well. He thanks Kiva and its field partner for this support.

loans.use: to buy clothing to resell

loans.name: Vilma Marely

texts.es:
Vilma de 44 años de edad,  no asistió nuca a la escuela ya que sus padres desconocían en esos tiempos la importancia actual de prepararse académicamente y además que no contaban con los recursos económicos suficientes para lo gastos educativos.  Es madre soltera de 5 hijos los cuales tampoco van a la escuela, por razones económicas y además que la distancia hasta la escuela es muy grande.

Ella con sus hijos se dedican al trabajo agrícola, especialmente la siembra de granos básicos tanto para el consumo del hogar con para la venta, además se dedican al cuido y producción de 3 vacas que también les generan ingresos por la venta de sus derivados.  La milpa y el ganado lo tiene a pocos metros de su casa sus hijos y ella realizan todos los trabajos de la milpa y al cuido de las vacas.

El préstamo que esta solicitando, es para comprar abono, fertilizantes,  para abonar toda la plantación que tienen cultivada de maíz y así poder tener una buena cosecha y por ende el aliento no faltara en su casa,  pues un cultivo sin abono no produce, y con lo que vendan pagara el préstamo y su calidad de vida también mejorara. 

Vilma espera que la cosecha sea muy buena que el cultivo le rinda lo máximo, además ella desea poder mejorar su casa y que sus hijos le sigan ayudando en el trabajo y así puedan tener ingresos para que la calidad de vida de todos en su familia mejore cada vez más pues hasta la fecha en la agricultura siempre les ha ido bien y ella está segura de seguir trabajando y ampliando más su actividad productiva con mucho esfuerzo y con a valiosa ayuda y apoyo de sus hijos.
texts.en:
Vilma is  44 years old.  She never went to school since when she was small her parents did not understand the importance of academic preparation and also did not have enough financial resources for school costs.   She is the single mother of five children who also aren't attending school, for financial reasons and because the school is far from their home.

With her children she earns a living at agricultural work, especially sowing basic grains,  as much for consumption in the home as for sale.  She also takes care of 3 cows, selling the milk products for income.  The corn patch and pasture for the cows are a few meters from her house.  She and her children do all the work of growing corn and taking care of the cows.

The loan she is seeking is to buy manure and fertilizers to enrich the area where she is growing corn and thus get a good harvest so that they won't be without hope at home, since plantings without fertilizer don't produce well.  From with what they sell she will pay back the loan and their quality of life will be improved.

Vilma hopes for a good harvest, that her crop will be as good as possible.  She also wants to improve her house and that her children keep helping with the work so they can have the  income needed for a good quality of life for everyone in her family.   Until now, her farming has always gone well and she is sure she can continue working and increasing her productivity with much effort and the valued help and support of her children.

loans.use: to buy manure and fertilizers to enrich the land where she is growing corn

loans.name: Monica

texts.es: Doña Mónica de 64 años de edad se dedica a la elaboración y venta de hamacas desde hace varios años, vive en casa propia con su esposo, su hija y dos nietos, ella comercializa su mercadería por los diferentes mercados que se encuentran cerca de su lugar de residencia, con lo que obtiene de sus ventas y con la ayuda de su esposo y su hija logran cubrir algunos gastos de su hogar, doña María está solicitando un crédito para la compra de lazos de colores para poder seguir con la elaboración de la hamacas y obtener mejores ganancias para darle a su familia una mejor estabilidad económica.
texts.en: Mónica, who is 64 years old, has been making and selling hammocks for many years. She lives in her own house with her husband, her daughter, and two grandchildren. She sells her products at various markets located near her home. She manages to cover some of the household expenses with what she earns from her sales and with the help of her husband and daughter. Mónica is requesting a loan to purchase colored yarn in order to continue making hammocks and thus generate higher profits to give her family better economic stability.

loans.use: to buy colored yarn.

loans.name: Anahi Karen

texts.es:
Anahí es una mujer de 21 años de edad, soltera y sin hijos.
Su vida la dedica al trabajo y el estudio, ella trabaja vendiendo cosméticos y artículos de vestir, con su trabajo se financia los gastos de sus estudios superiores en enfermería. Su carrera es a nivel licenciatura con una duración de cuatro años, ella se encuentra estudiando en segundo año y muchas veces se le dificulta estudiar y trabajar, por el momento todo le ha salido bien pero también tiene una gran inconveniente; la falta de una computadora propia para estudiar. Ella sueña en salir profesional y trabajar en un gran hospital ayudando a la gente a recuperarse de sus dolencias.
Es por ese motivo que Anahí solicita un préstamo para comprar una laptop y ser enfermera para ayudar a la gente.
texts.en:
Anahí is a 21-year-old woman, and she is single, with no children. 

She devotes her life to work and study; she works selling cosmetics and articles of clothing, and with her work she pays the costs of her post-secondary nursing studies.  She is in the second year of her four-year baccalaureate level program, and many times it is difficult for her to study and work.  Up to the moment, everything has gone well for her, but she also has a big problem: the lack of her own computer for studying. 

She dreams of becoming professional and working in a big hospital, helping people to recuperate from their illnesses.  This is why Anahí is requesting a loan: to purchase a laptop, and to be a nurse in order to help people.

loans.use: to purchase a laptop and to be a professional nurse in order to help people.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy basic grains, juices, sodas, cookies, oil, bread, snack foods, soap, sweets, and other products.

loans.name: Yelba Del Pilar

texts.es: Yelba del Pilar, mayor de edad acompañada con siete hijos de los cuales solo los dos últimos menores están bajo su responsabilidad, originaria de Chinandega ubicado en el occidente del país, Yelba se caracteriza por ser una mujer  Humilde,trabajadora, responsable y con muchos deseos de superación personal, se dedica a la comercialización de mariscos los que acopia de comerciantes que viene de otros municipios y zonas pesqueras de occidente, Yelba compra diariamente productos de mariscos como: Pescado, camarones, conchas, almejas, jaibas y otros los que viaja a entregar a comerciantes de los mercados de otro departamento, para esta actividad cuenta con equipos como: una camioneta nissan, bines, tinas, cajillas y pesas, gracias a estos ingresos de este negocio ha logrado sacar adelante a sus hijos quienes tambien han aprendido el oficio de este negocio y actualmente se dedican a la comercialización de mariscos, inicia este negocio con fondos propios productos de ahorros que tenia de su trabajo anterior que era la comercialización de frutas y perecederos el cual lo deja porque mira que tenia ingresos mas altos  con el negocio de mariscos sus compras las realiza al contado y sus ventas son al contado tiene clientes fijos y eventuales inicia su jornada diaria desde muy temprano, uno de sus sueños es poder crecer mas en su negocio y mejorar aun mas sus ingresos,su propiedad y que sus dos hijos menores salgan adelante el objetivo de este financiamiento es para invertir en capital de trabajo en la compra de camarones, logrando aprovechar la temporada alta de producción de camarón por el invierno.
texts.en:
Yelba del Pilar is grown up, with seven children, of which only the last two are under her care. She is originally from Chinandega, located in the West of the country. Yelba is known as a humble, hardworking, and responsible woman eager for personal fulfillment. 

She works marketing seafood which she buys from traders that arrive from other municipalities and from fisheries out West. Yelba purchases seafood products daily, like fish, shrimp, mussels, clams, crabs and others. In turn, she sells them to retailers in other towns. For this activity, she depends on equipment like a Nissan truck, bins, tubs, scales and weights. She started this business using her own savings which she had earned from a previous business in which she traded fruits and perishable goods, but came to realize that the seafood business generated greater revenue.

Thanks to revenue from this business, Yelba has managed to raise her children, who have also learned this trade and are currently engaged in the marketing of seafood.

She makes her purchases and her sales in cash; she has regular customers as well as potential customers. She begins her workday very early.

One of her dreams is to grow the business more and improve its revenue, to improve her property and that her two younger children are able to thrive.

The purpose of this loan is to invest the working capital in buying shrimp, trying to take advantage of the high season for shrimp production in the winter.

loans.use: to buy mainly shrimp but also fish, seafood, clams, and mussells.

loans.name: Lirio Del Valle Group

texts.es: El grupo solidario está integrado por tres socias y coordinado por doña Aura Lila, es una mujer fuerte y emprendedora que ha trabajado por tres años en su negocio con el cual se ayuda para mantener a hijo de 4 años, la socia se dedica a atender una pulpería y cuenta con la ayuda de su marido que le ayuda económicamente. Con el crédito la socia quiere invertir en la compra de más productos para su negocio como gaseosas, repostería, granos básicos etc. Una de las metas de la socia es llegar a ser enfermera y pagarse los estudios con los ingresos de la pulpería. Gracias a los créditos anteriores doña Aura Lila posee más variedad de  productos en su venta. Otra de sus socias es la señora Junieth de 21 años se dedica a la venta de ropa usada y fritanga, don Juan de 41 años se dedica a atender una mini pulpería.
texts.en: The solidarity group is formed by three members and coordinated by Aura Lila, she is a strong entreprenurial woman that has worked for three years in her business.  The business helps her support her four year old son.  The member has a convenience store and is helped by her husband, who also helps her economically. With the loan she wants to buy more products for her business like sodas, baking, basic grains, etc.  One of her goals is to become a nurse and pay for her studies with income from the convenience store.  It is because of the previous loans provided that Aura Lilia has a better variety of products for sale at the store.  Another one of the members is Junieth, 21, who works selling used clothing and snacks. Juan, 41 years old works at a small convenience store.

loans.use: to buy more products for their business like soda, baking, basic grains, etc.

loans.name: Dario Cristhian

texts.es:
Dario es un joven emprendedor, tiene 21 años de edad y vive en Chilca junto a su familia. Desde hace más de 1 año trabaja como Vigilante en una prestigiosa empresa. Le va muy  bien porque es muy responsable, trabajador, honesto y con muchos deseos de superación. Su mayor motivación en la vida es su familia, es por ellos que lucha día a día para poder brindarles un futuro mejor.
Dario está agradecido con los prestamistas Kiva porque con el apoyo que le han brindado él podrá adquirir una mototaxi para así tener un ingreso adicional y podrá mejorar su calidad de vida. De esta manera seguirá esforzándose para poder cumplir su gran sueño: "Construir su vivienda de material noble".
texts.en:
Dario is an enterprising young man. He is 21 years old, and he lives in Chilca with his family. 

He has been working as a security guard in a prestigious company for more than a year, and it is going very well for him because he is responsible, hardworking, and honest, with a great desire to excel. His greatest motivation in life is his family, and every day he fights to be able to give them a better future.

Dario is grateful to the Kiva lenders, because with the support that they have given him, he will be able to acquire a motorcycle taxi, and thus have an additional income; and he will be able to improve his quality of life. In this way, he will continue striving to accomplish his great dream: to build his house of quality materials.

loans.use: to purchase a motorcycle taxi.

loans.name: Adela

texts.es:
Adela es una mujer de 39 años de edad, casada y madre de 2 hijos.
Ella es una emprendedora exitosa en los negocios, hace más de diez años que se dedica a la elaboración de comida para su venta y hasta el momento continua con esa labor. Ella tiene dos hijos en la escuela primaria a los cuales incentiva mucho en el estudio.
Adela junto a su esposo está iniciando otro negocio se trata de un taller de confección de chamarras de temporada, su esposo trabaja en la industria de la confección y costura de ropa. Este nuevo emprendimiento es un sueño que ambos quieren cumplir desde hace varios años para esto necesitan comprar una máquina tapacosturas de tela, con eso completarán sus necesidades laborales y terminarán de armar su taller de costura.
Es por esos motivos que Adela solicita un préstamo para la compra de una máquina tapacosturas para la confección de chamarras con su esposo.
texts.en:
Adela is a 39 year old woman who is married and mother to 2 children. She is a successful business entrepreneur. She has been making meals to sell for more than 10 years and she continues in this field. She has two children studying in Primary school who she tries to motivate a lot. Adela along with her husband are starting another business. It is a sewing workshop to make jackets for the season. Her husband works in the sewing industry.

This new undertaking is a dream that both of them have wanted to carry out for a number of years. They would have to buy a double seam machine. With this they would complete their working needs and could complete the outfitting of their sewing workshop. For this reason Adela is requesting a loan to buy a double seam machine to make jackets with her husband.

loans.use: to buy a double seam machine to make jackets.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy soil amendments and fertilizer for her coffee

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy fertilizers, fungicides, and other supplies.

loans.name: Maria Soledad

texts.es:
María, con ayuda del financiamiento anterior ha logrado mejorar su negocio, tiene nuevos ingresos con los que ha mejorado las circunstancias familiares y reparado su vivienda.
Nuevamente solicita capital para comprar vacas, bolsas y pagar el destazo, de esta manera seguirá abasteciendo a sus clientes y teniendo ingresos que necesita para responder de manera positiva a los pagos de la deuda.
texts.en:
With her previous loan, María was able to improve her business. She has new income that was used to improve her family’s circumstances and repair her house.

María is requesting capital so that she can buy cows, bags, and pay for butchering. This will enable her to supply her customers and generate the income she needs to keep her debt payments on track.

loans.use: to buy cows, bags, and pay for butchering.

loans.name: Merlinda

texts.en:
As the married mother of nine children, Merlinda works hard to support her family.

She has a food vending business in the Philippines, and also earns additional income from selling vegetables. Merlinda is borrowing PHP 12,000 through NWTF in order to buy ingredients for her food business.

Merlinda has been sustaining her business activities through her past eleven loans from NWTF. She hopes that her hard work will help her attain her dream of saving enough money to expand her business and repair her family's home.

loans.use: to buy ingredients for her food business.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy a dairy cow

loans.name: Jesús

texts.es:
Jesús es un pequeño cafetalero de la zona norte de Nicaragua. Con 59 años de edad, es un productor apasionado por lo que hace. Junto a su esposa, y tres hijos, trabaja su pequeña finca para mejorar sus condiciones de vida. 

La actividad agrícola a la que se dedica fue herencia de su padre, y ahora él la transmite a sus hijos, enseñándoles el amor a la caficultura; para que sus descendientes sigan la misma actividad económica. 

En los tres últimos ciclos, ha logrado mantener una cosecha con calidad y volumen estable, esto a pesar del ataque de la plaga de “Roya” que afectó las plantaciones en el país, y que es considerada una de las enfermedades de plantas más catastróficas de toda la historia. 

Para mantener el buen desarrollo de su producción, Jesús solicita un financiamiento para la compra de insumos agrícolas que le ayuden a mejorar la nutrición de sus plantas, lo cuales parte del plan de mantenimiento de su cafetal. Con esto conseguirá resultados que impactarán positivamente su vida y comunidad
texts.en:
Jesús is a small coffee grower in northern Nicaragua. At 59 years of age, he is a producer who is passionate about what he does. Jesús, his wife, and their three children work on their small farm in order to improve their living conditions.

Jesús learned how to farm from his father. Now he is passing on his knowledge to his children and teaching them the love of coffee growing so that their descendants can follow in their footsteps.

For the past three cycles, Jesús has maintained a quality harvest and stable volumes despite the spread of coffee rust that has affected coffee plantations throughout the country. This is considered to be one of the most catastrophic plant diseases that is known in all of history.

In order to keep his crops well-developed, Jesús is requesting a loan in order to buy farming supplies that will help improve the nutrition for his plants. This is part of the maintenance regimen for his coffee farm. As a result, he will continue achieving results that will positively impact his life and his community.

loans.use: to buy farming supplies for his coffee crops.

loans.name: Yohaan Hermilson

texts.es:
El joven Yohaan, de 20 años es un joven muy emprendedor y trabajador, recién ha salido de sus estudios técnicos y desea comenzar a ganarse la vida.
El planea iniciar con un negocio de confecciones al lado de su suegra quien le enseñara el oficio y lo preparara para el trabajo.
El solicita una ayuda para la compra de insumos como telas, hilos y agujas, elementos que le permitirán comenzar con su proyecto y comenzar a forjarse un futuro.
Yohaan, como muchos jóvenes en la ciudad de Medellín completan la lista de los jóvenes emprendedores que día a día buscan oportunidades y que con su energía pueden lograr grandes cosas buscando siempre el bienestar de sus familias y comunidad.
texts.en:
Yohaan, age 20, is an enterprising and hardworking young man. He recently quit his technical studies so that he could start earning a living.

Yohaan plans to start a sewing business with his mother-in-law, who was the one who taught him this trade and prepared him for this type of work. The loan he is requesting will help him to buy supplies such as fabrics, thread, and needles. These items will allow him to start this project so that he can forge a future for himself.

Like many young people in the city of Medellín, Yohaan is among the list of young entrepreneurs who are looking for opportunities each day. With his energy, he will be able to accomplish great things and always look after the welfare of his family and community.

loans.use: to buy supplies such as fabrics, thread, and needles.

loans.name: Yobetina

texts.en:
Yobetina is a 51-year-old married woman who lives in the Nyamira area of Kenya, which is a popular banana growing region and one of the best areas in terms of farming because the weather patterns there favor farming activities. The main challenge though is inadequate farmland because of the large number of people there, but this does not hinder Yobetina from always rising up at 4 o’clock in the morning to go to her farm.

Through hard work Yobetina has been able to take care of her large family of 10 children and her husband. Yobetina has always enjoyed farming and has been doing farming for the last 40 years and through these years in farming she has mastered her trade very well.

Through farming she is able to provide the basic needs of her family, which include food, clothing and education.

In order to continue making profits and supporting her large family. Yobetina is seeking a loan of KES 20,800 to buy a dairy cow to cater to the demand for milk that is in her area and customers who always demand milk.

She hopes that with the dairy cow she will be able to generate more income and comfortably support her family needs without any big challenge.

loans.use: to buy a dairy cow

loans.name: Isabel

texts.es:
La socia Isabel  se sigue dedicando al negocio de venta de verduras, la socia lleva a diferentes lugares, la socia vende cebollas, tomates y zapallos, la socia ya tiene varios años en este negocio y le va muy bien, el sueño de la socia es tener un local donde pueda vender las  verduras. La socia solicita el crédito para comprar  verduras como cebollas, zanahorias y tomates. 

La socia está feliz por el préstamo y se compromete a cumplir con los pagos de su cuota.
texts.en:
Isabel continues to manage a business of selling vegetables. She conducts her business in different places. Isabel sells onions, tomatoes, and squash. She has been in this business for several years and is doing very well. Her dream is to have a shop where she can sell vegetables. Isabel is requesting a loan in order to buy vegetables such as onions, carrots, and tomatoes.

She is pleased with the loan and promises to complete her payments.

loans.use: to buy vegetables such as onions, carrots, and tomatoes.

loans.name: Cristian Orlando

texts.es:
Cristian es un hombre trabajador, tiene 29 años de edad, es soltero y vive en San Vicente junto a su familia. Tiene un hijo quien es su mayor motivación en la vida y por quien lucha día a día para poder brindarle un futuro mejor. Desde hace más de 5 años se dedica a brindar servicios de transporte en una mototaxi que tiene, le va muy bien porque es muy responsable, honesto, luchador y siempre se preocupa porque los clientes lleguen a salvo a su destino.
Cristian está agradecido con los prestamistas Kiva porque con el apoyo que le han brindado podrá iniciar con los trámites de actualización de la tarjeta de propiedad de su moto, así mantendrá todo en regla y seguirá trabajando con mucho esfuerzo y dedicación para sacar adelante a su familia.
texts.en:
Cristian is a hardworking man. He is 29 years old, single, and lives with his family in San Vicente. Cristian has a son who is his primary motivation in life. For this reason, he strives each day to provide a better future for his son. For more than five years, Cristian has been providing transportation services with the motorcycle taxi that he owns. He is doing very well because he is responsible, honest, and determined. In addition, he is always concerned about getting his customers to their destination safely.

Cristian is grateful to the Kiva lenders because of the support they have provided. He will be able to start the application process for getting a registration card for his motorcycle taxi. Cristian wants to keep everything in order. He will continue working with great effort and dedication so that his family can get ahead.

loans.use: to file the paperwork for obtaining a vehicle registration card for his motorcycle taxi.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy fabrics, thread, needles, and other sewing supplies.

loans.name: Ramses

texts.es: Ramses, mayor de edad padre soltero de una hija mayor de edad el cual trabaja y estudia a la misma vez, es de origen Chinandegano, zona que se caracteriza por ser productivamente comercial y turística,es un microempresario el cual posee en su casa de habitación una mini-pulperia donde ofrece productos de consumo como: ventas de golosinas, gaseosas, jugos, pan, galletas, cosméticos, cremas, perfumenes, maquillajes entre otros, al igual que tambien tiene juegos de nintendos, Ramses se caracteriza por ser un hombre trabajador, responsable, honrado y con muchos deseos de superación personal, sus compras las realiza al contado en otros departamentos y en distribuidoras de esta localidad, sus ventas son al contado a clientes fijos y eventuales tambien entrega de forma ambulante algunos productos de cosméticos por pedidos que le hacen sus clientes, uno de sus sueños siempre es que su negocio pueda crecer mas y ver coronar una carrera a su hija,inicio su negocio al quedarse desempleado  lo cual considera fue una buena decisión porque con su pequeño negocio sale adelante en el día día y apoya a su hija para ser cada día mejor y que sea una profesional de éxito   el objetivo de este nuevo financiamiento es para invertir en capital de trabajo en la compra de productos como: jugos, gaseosas, galletas, productos de cosméticos entre otros mas. Ramses agradece mucho la oportunidad que los inversionistas kivas les ofrece a personas de bajos recursos económicos.
texts.en:
Ramses, an adult and the single father of a daughter who works and studies at the same time, is originally from Chinandega, an area characterized by being both commercial and touristy. 

He is a micro-entrepreneur with a mini-grocery store in his home that offers consumer products such as candy, soft drinks, juices, bread, biscuits, cosmetics, creams, perfumes, makeup etc., as well as Nintendo games.

Ramses is known for being a hardworking man, responsible, honest, and eager for self-improvement.

He makes his purchases in cash in other cities and from distributors in his own town. His sales are in cash to regular and prospective customers, and he also makes travelling sales by delivering some orders to customers.

One of his dreams is for his business to grow more and for his daughter be crowned with a college degree.

He started his business when he became unemployed, which he considers a good decision because with his small business he gets by every day and is able to support his daughter to improve daily and on her quest to become a professional.

The goal of this new round of loans is to purchase products such as juices, soft drinks, biscuits, cosmetics and others products. 

Ramses is grateful for the opportunity that Kiva investors offer those people with low-income.

loans.use: to buy candies, soft drinks, juices and cosmetics, among others.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: buy rabbits and condiments

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: Buy baby products.

loans.name: Reina Elizabeth

texts.es:
Reina de 33 años de edad, estudio hasta segundo grado en la escuela porque tenía que trabajar para poder vivir debido a que sus padres la dejaron sola, entonces ella tenía que trabajar para poder sostenerse.  Ella es madres soltera de tres hijos los cuales son de las edades de 10, 8, y 5 años de edad los cuales estudian en la escuela, los tres dependen de ella en su casa  habitan 4 personas sus tres hijos y ella.

Reina  se dedica a los oficios domésticos se dedicó a esta actividad desde que era pequeña debido a que sus padres la abandonaron, entonces ella salía a servir a otras casas para ganar dinero y así comprar su comida,  vestuario y medicina, comenta que unos vecinos le dieron refugio en su casa para que pudiera pasar las noches; pero durante el día ella tenía que trabajar pero encontró una familia que le dio trabajo y también podía quedarse a dormir en su casa por la distancia que quedaba donde ella estaba antes, cuando ella creció comenta que conoció a un hombre el cual es el padre de sus hijos, pero la abandono y quedo sola  luchando con sus tres hijos, comenta que con esfuerzos pudo poner una pequeña tienda la cual le ayuda para el sostenimiento de su hogar, dice que ya tiene 3 años de tener su negocio y que hasta la fecha le ha ido muy bien.

El préstamo que esta solicitado a CREDICAMPO,  es para comprar una plancha,  una hilera, sillas, mesas para poner una pupuseria y así poder tener mejores ingresos económicos en su hogar y poder darles un mejor nivel de vida a sus hijos y poder darles un futuro mejor.
Reina planea para su futuro poder construir una buena casa, porque la que tiene actualmente es de tierra, también planea poder ayudarle en el estudio a sus hijos que tengan una buena educación y puedan obtener una carrera universitaria, también planea hacer crecer su negocio y tener buenos ingresos económicos para darle una vida mejor a su familia.
texts.en:
Reina is 33 years old.  She studied only through second grade at school because she had to work for a living because her parents abandoned her.  She had to work to support herself. She is a single mother of three children who are aged 10, 8 and 5 years old.  They are studying in school.  The three depend on her.  Her household consists of 4 people; her three children and herself.

Reina worked at housekeeping since she was little because her parents abandoned her.  She went to work in other homes to earn money to buy food, clothing and medicine.  Her neighbors gave her shelter in their house so she could spend the night; but during the day, she had to work.  She found a family who gave her a job and she could also stay overnight at this house due to the the distance from where she was before.

When she grew up, she met a man who is the father of her children, but he neglected and abandoned her to struggle with their three children.  She says that with efforts she could add a small shop which will help her to sustain her home.  She has been in business three years and to date has done very well.

The loan requested from CREDICAMPO is to buy building materials, chairs, tables to add a snack bar so she can have better income at home and to give her children a better life and to give them a future better.

Reina plans for their future to build a good house, because she currently has the land.  She also plans to help in the studies of her children to get a good education and to obtain a university degree.  She also plans to grow her business and have good income to provide a better life for his family.

loans.use: to buy a building materials, chairs, tables to add a Pupuseria (snack bar) so she can have better income at home.

loans.name: M. Azam

texts.en:
M. Azam is a 28-year-old young and energetic youth living in the area of Lahore, Pakistan. He is unmarried and recently started supporting his father in his business selling clothes. His father is a retired government servant and started this business with this hope that Azam would be the next person taking charge of the business and become the earning person for the family. His father has great expectations for him and Azam wants to fulfill his expectations. Currently, this garment shop is the only source of income for his family, which is the reason he devotes his all concentration and time to the garment shop.
 
Their shop is situated in the garment market and the competition is high in the market. Due to this competition, it is very difficult to convince customers to pay a high price. This competition has led to lower profit margins. In order to keep up with the competition, he has to maintain the latest designs, reasonable rates and delightful colors of garments in the shop so that he can maintain the rate of sales.

Now that the new season has arrived, he needs to purchase garments for the summer season according to the local customers' tastes and earn good profits but he does not have sufficient cash in hand to buy the garments. Therefore, M. Azam requested a loan from Kiva’s field partner BRAC Pakistan for the second time.  He thanks Kiva and its field partner over this support.

loans.use: To buy ready made garments to sell

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy a dairy cow

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: Buy a sewing machine and sewing supplies.

loans.name: Edwin

texts.en:
Edwin lives in the village of Santo Rosario. Edwin’s wife works at the school as a teacher. They have two children. He is seriously engaged in agricultural activities. On his plot of land he cultivates corn and rice. He sells all this harvest at the city wholesale market through re-sellers.

He is asking for a loan of PHP 10,000 in order to buy fertilizer, seeds to grow, and pesticide, which he needs for his land cultivation.

loans.use: to buy fertilizer, seeds and pesticide

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: buy palm nuts

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: buy a sewing machine

loans.name: Editha

texts.en:
Editha works hard to support her family. She is widowed and has a restaurant business in the Philippines.

She requested a PHP 12,000 loan through NWTF to buy additional ingredients like meat, fish, vegetables, etc.

Editha has been in this business for 11 years now.

She would like to save enough to provide a secure future for her family.

loans.use: to buy additional ingredients like meat, fish, and vegetables

loans.name: Rhanel

texts.en:
Rhanel, 32, is married with three children and all of them are in their primary stage of education. 

Rhanel and his wife, Monaliza, are both farmers and own their farmland. He has been farming for the past 16 years. He enjoys farming because it is a reliable livelihood and he believes he can improve his farm’s yields.

Rhanel would like to use his Kiva loan funds to pay labor costs, to buy fertilizers, seeds, and herbicides and pay for tractor services during the rice production season. This will help him to earn enough money to fund his children’s’ education and he hopes to continue to maximize his profits to build better housing accommodations for his family.

loans.use: to buy fertilizers, seeds, herbicides and pay for tractor services

loans.name: Hadisa

texts.ru: Хадиса родилась в 1995 году. Она молодая и энергичная девушка. Хадиса живет вместе со своими родителями. Она несколько лет училась у портнихи шитью женской одежды. Она теперь хочет организовать свой собственный бизнес предоставлением услуги швеи. С такой целью она участвовала в курсе «Добейся Успеха» организованного Ассоциация Деловых Женщин и получила сертификат. Хадиса запрашивает займ на сумму 5000 сомони для покупки швейной машинки. Она ждет вашу доброту.
texts.en: Hadisa was born in 1995.  She is a young and energetic young lady.  Hadisa lives together with her parents.  She's been apprenticed to a seamstress for a few years, and is hoping to start working for herself in the near future.  With this goal in mind, she enrolled in a course titled "Achieve Success" sponsored by an association for businesswomen and received a certificate upon completion.  Hadisa is requesting a loan of 5000 somoni to buy a sewing machine, and is counting on your kindness.

loans.use: buy a sewing machine to start a new business

loans.name: Mengil

texts.en:
Mengil works hard to support her family. She is married and has a buy and sell of used clothing business in the Philippines.

She requested a PHP 15,000 loan through NWTF to purchase an additional bundle of used clothing to sell.

Mengil has been in this business for 15 years now.

In the future, she would like to save enough money so she can afford to send her children to college.

loans.use: to purchase an additional bundle of used clothing to sell

loans.name: Ferdinand

texts.en:
HELLO! Meet Ferdinand who resides in the Eldoret area of Kenya, which is home to some of the best elite runners that the world has ever produced. He is a hardworking farmer who has been doing farming for the past seven years. He is a family man and has one wife and two adorable kids. His primary source of income is crop farming and cattle keeping.
 
Ferdinand is a dedicated farmer whose zeal to succeed is very high. He wants to get out of the poverty that is currently bedeviling him. Poverty is one of the things that he hates most, which is why he is seeking a loan of KES 10,000 to purchase farm inputs and increase his yields on the farm. Inputs that he will buy include high quality fertilizer and seedlings that will double the food production on his farm. As a result of this, he will be getting more money than he was getting and hence be able to get out of the poverty level. Ferdinand is very comfortable with the repayment schedule and he is sure that he will be able to clear the loan.

loans.use: To buy farm inputs

loans.name: Martha Xiomara

texts.es: Doña Martha es una mujer fuerte y emprendedora que ha trabajado por tres años en su negocio, la socia se dedica a la venta de comida a domicilio y cuenta solo con la ayuda de un empleado que le ayuda a vender y hacer compras. Con el crédito doña Martha lo invertirá en comprar más productos para su negocio como verduras, carnes, granos básicos y también algunas ollas de cocina. Una de las metas de la socia es llegar a obtener su propia casa, gracias a los créditos anteriores ha aumentado sus ventas, obtener más clientes y tener sus propios ahorros para la compra de una casa.
texts.en: Martha is a strong and enterprising woman who has been working at her own business for three years. This borrower makes a living selling home-delivered meals. She receives help only from one employee, who supports her in buying stock and selling her products. Martha will use this loan in order to buy products for her business, such as vegetables, meat, basic grains, and some pots and pans. One of Martha's goals is to own her own house. Thanks to previous loans, Martha has increased sales, gained more customers, and has her own savings to buy a house.

loans.use: to buy vegetables and meat.

loans.name: Charito

texts.en:
As a married parent of three children, Charito works hard to support her family.

She has a buy and sell of herbal medicines business in the Philippines and earns additional income from food vending. Charito is borrowing PHP 20,000 through NWTF to purchase additional stock of herbal medicines to sell. 

Charito has been sustaining her business activities through her past 22 loans from NWTF. She hopes that her hard work will help her attain her dream of building and expanding her business to secure the future of her family.

loans.use: to purchase additional stocks of herbal medicines to sell

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: To buy a goat

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy farming supplies to help her coffee crops.

loans.name: Eloisa Del Carmen

texts.es: Eloísa de 31 años de edad vive con sus hijos y compañero de vida en casa propia, ella tiene una pequeña tienda ubicada en su lugar de residencia,  donde vende variedad de productos a buen precio, por esa razón posee mucha clientela,  con lo que gana de sus ventas logra solventar algunas necesidades de su hogar,  Eloísa solicita un crédito para la compra de mas mercadería como granos básicos, sopas, aceite, café, detergentes, etc. y así poder darles una mejor calidad de  vida a su familia sin limitación alguna.
texts.en: Eloísa is 31 years old and lives with her children and partner in a house that the family owns. Eloísa has a small shop that she runs out of her home. There she sells a variety of products and at good prices, which is why she has many customers. With the income from her sales, Eloísa is able to cover some household costs. Eloísa is applying for a loan in order to buy more merchandise such as basic grains, soups, oil, coffee, detergents and more. This way she can give her family a higher quality of life.

loans.use: to buy basic grains, soups, oil, coffee, detergents and more.

loans.name: Matias

texts.en: Matias thanks all Kiva lenders for helping him to purchase fertilizers and pesticides. He has repaid his loan to Kiva lenders on time and was able to save some money for the future of his family and pay the fees for his children's education. He approaches ASKI MFI and Kiva lenders for another loan of 15,000 PHP to purchase fertilizers and pesticides and continue production.

loans.use: to purchase fertilizers and pesticides

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to make improvements to his home (to daub the walls).

loans.name: Junalie

texts.en:
Junalie is 44 years old, married and works hard to support her family.

She has a restaurant business in the Philippines and earns additional income from buying and selling peanuts. Junalie is borrowing PHP 30,000 through NWTF to buy more ingredients like canned goods, meat, vegetables, etc for her restaurant business.

Junalie has been sustaining her business activities through her past 23 loans from NWTF. She hopes that her hard work will help her attain her dream of saving to expand her business.

loans.use: to buy more ingredients like canned goods, meat, and vegetables

loans.name: M. Shahid

texts.en:
M. Shahid is an auto electrician by profession and owns an auto electric spare parts shop in the area of Lahore, Pakistan. He lives near his shop. M. Shahid is married. His wife is a stay at home mother with four children and his parents also live with them. But he hardly gets to spend time with them, as he has a hectic business. 

His shop is situated in the vehicle spare parts market and it is challenging for him to sell his products with such fierce competition. This competition highly affects his daily sales. To increase sales and abstain from the competitors, he decided to offer some additional new, updated electric spare parts. He hopes that this strategy to upgrade his business will work positively and the customers will be attracted to his newly introduced products. He cannot act upon his strategy without some additional capital. Therefore, he has decided to request a loan from Kiva’s field partner BRAC Pakistan. He believes that this loan will help him implement this strategy to overcome the ongoing competition in the market.

loans.use: To buy the latest, up-to-date electrical components for vehicles to sell

loans.name: Gina

texts.en:
Gina is 43 years old and married with three children, two of whom are in school, Gina works very hard to provide for them.

She runs a general store in the Philippines and requested a PHP 20,000 loan through NWTF to buy items like shampoo, groceries, etc. to sell in her general store.

Gina has been in this business for seven years.

In the future, she would like to save enough money so she can afford to send her children to college.

loans.use: to buy items to sell like shampoo and groceries to sell

loans.name: Jocelyn

texts.en:
Jocelyn is 48 years old and married with three children. She is a very hardworking entrepreneur. 

She has a general store business in the Philippines. Jocelyn requested a PHP 30,000 loan through NWTF to purchase items to sell like canned goods, shampoo, soap, milk, eggs, etc.

Jocelyn has been in this business for 20 years. In the future, Jocelyn would like to save money to expand her business.

loans.use: to purchase items to sell like canned goods, shampoo, soap, milk, and eggs

loans.name: Maria Ines

texts.es: María de 43 años de edad vive con su madre y sus dos hijos en casa propia, ella se dedica a la crianza de gallina ponedoras desde hace un año, comercializa sus productos en los diferentes mercados que se encuentran cerca de su casa, con lo que gana de sus ventas logra solventar algunas necesidades de su hogar, Maria solicita un crédito para la compra de concentrado para las gallinas y para la construcción de galera donde mantiene a las gallinas que es la que muestra en la fotografía  y así poder darle una mejor calidad de vida a su familia.
texts.en:
María, 43, lives with her mother and her two children in the house she owns.  She raises egg-laying hens and has been in business for a year.  She sells her products at the different fairs near her house and earns enough income to cover some household needs.

Maria is requesting a loan to buy animal feed for the hens and to build a chicken coop as shown in the photograph.  She wants to give her family a better quality of life.

loans.use: To buy animal feed for her hens and to build a chicken coop.

loans.name: Andres

texts.en: Andres is a client and a resident of rural Santo Rosario. He is aged 37 years old. He deals in agriculture and wants to improve his output so that he can increase his income. However, he lacks enough money to buy organic manure and hire labor. That’s why he has come to ASKI for a loan. He hopes that it will change his output by increasing his yields, so that he will be able to harvest more rice. He applied for a loan of 15,000 PHP and is optimistic that this will change his income and status. He is grateful that Kiva lenders are willing to support his dream of alleviating the poverty of his household. He is hardworking.

loans.use: to buy organic manure and hire labor.

loans.name: Maxima Rosmery

texts.es:
Máxima es una mujer soltera de 43 años de edad madre de 1 hijo.
Su hijo estudia en la escuela primaria y le gusta mucho jugar futbol y practicar deportes, su madre lo alienta en sus gustos porque piensa que el deporte es sano y cultiva su mente. Máxima se dedica a la costura de ropa tradicional que consiste en polleras y enaguas. Estas prendas son utilizadas por mujeres de costumbres tradicionales (cholitas) y son muy cotizadas en el sector. Ella necesita comprar tela por mayor para abaratar costos y cubrir la oferta de su negocio ya que la competencia es diaria. Máxima desea que su hijo tenga una mejor vida y con la inversión en su negocio piensa que logrará un mejor futuro para él.
Es por esos motivos que Máxima solicita un préstamo para la compra de telas por mayor para poder pagar los estudios de su hijo.
texts.en:
Máxima, 43, is single and has a son who attends primary school and enjoys playing soccer and other sports.  His mother encourages him because she thinks sport is a healthy activity and cultivates the mind.

Máxima is a seamstress and makes traditional clothing, consisting of skirts and underskirts.  This clothing is used by women who maintain traditional customs (cholitas) and it is very much in demand.  She needs to buy wholesale fabric to reduce costs in order to cover demand since there is much daily competition.

Máxima wants her son to have a better lifestyle; and by investing in her business she will be able to give it to him.  That is why Máxima is requesting a loan to buy wholesale fabric and to pay for her son's education.

loans.use: To buy wholesale fabrics and pay for her son's education.

loans.name: Thelma

texts.en:
Thelma is a hardworking entrepreneur who has a business selling vegetables in the Philippines. 

She is borrowing 10,000 PHP through NWTF to purchase additional stocks of vegetables to sell at her vegetable selling business.

Thelma has been in this business for ten years. She earns more income by buying and selling used clothes.

Thelma has been sustaining her business activities through her own efforts and with the help of loans from NWTF. She dreams of saving money to expand her business in the future.

loans.use: to purchase addtional stocks of vegetables to sell

loans.name: Karla Vanessa

texts.es: Karla de 29 años de edad vive con su hermano mayor. Ella tiene una pequeña tienda en su casa y su hermano la apoya económicamente con su trabajo, ellos necesitan cambiar el techo del patio de su casa dado que  sus pertenencias se  dañan cuando llueve. Por lo anterior  solicita este préstamo a FUSAI para invertir  en la compra de lamina galvanizada y madera  y así reparar el techo de su patio lo antes posible.
texts.en: Karla is 29 years old and lives with her older brother. She has a small shop in her home and her brother supports her economically with her work. They need to change the roof of the patio of their home because their belongings get damaged when it rains. For this reason, Karla is requesting a loan from FUSAI in order to invest in the purchase of galvanized sheeting and wood so that she can repair the roof of her patio as soon as possible.

loans.use: to purchase galvanized sheeting and wood to repair the roof of her patio.

loans.name: Maximiliano

texts.es:
Maximiliano de 75 años de edad,  no estudio debido a que en su tiempo apto para ir a la escuela estaba complicada la situación por el conflicto armado y por seguridad no salían de la casa,  además las escuelas no estaban en funcionamiento, se casó su esposa es ama de casa se dedica a la realización de las actividades de su casa y la atención de su familia.

 Por más de 40 años Maximiliano se ha dedica a la agricultura y la ganadería estas tareas las aprendió hacer con su padre y decidió dedicarse a esto porque noto que era rentable, su lugar de trabajo le queda 3 km de su casa camina media hora, sus hijos ya se casaron solo uno le ayuda en el trabajo, trabajan todos los días desde tempranas horas hasta el atardecer.

Con el crédito comprara abono y pesticidas para aplicarlos al cultivo para evitar pérdidas por plagas y carencias de abono en el suelo y así obtendrá una buena cosecha, espera que la milpa le rinda al máximo y tener granos disponibles para el consumo del hogar y también para la venta.

Con las ganancias que obtenga cancelara el crédito y parte invertirá en la próxima temporada agrícola, además planea mejorara su casa y que su calidad de vida vaya mejorando cada vez más y manifiesta que  solo con esfuerzo, mucho trabajo y con la ayuda de Dios y su familia lo lograra.
texts.en:
Maximiliano, 75, was unable to get an education because when he was old enough to go to school there was armed conflict all around and he could not leave home for security reasons.  And the schools were not even operating.  His wife is a homemaker and cares for the family.

For over 40 years Maximilliano has worked in agriculture and livestock farming which he learned from his father.  He went into this business because he observed that it was profitable.  His place of work is 3 kilometers from his home and he walks there in about half an hour.  His children are married and one of his sons helps at work every day from the early morning hours until the evening.

Maximiliano will use the loan to buy compost and pesticides for his crops to avoid disease and poor soil quality.  This is so he will obtain a good harvest.  He hopes to achieve maximum maize production and have enough for home consumption and for sales.

He will use the profits to pay off the loan and to invest in the next crop season.  He also wants to renovate his house and improve his quality of life.  He says that only through much effort, hard work, God's help and that of his family will he be able to meet his goal.

loans.use: To buy compost and pesticides for his crops to avoid loss through disease and lack of quality soil, to insure a good harvest.

loans.name: Cristina Mercedes

texts.es: Cristina de 56 años de edad es una mujer emprendedora que apoya a su esposo en los gastos del hogar, comprando pollos de engorde para luego venderlos. Ella y su esposo son muy trabajadores pero se  han visto en la necesidad de cambiar el techo de su hogar ya que se encuentra en malas  condiciones. Es por esto que solicita este crédito a FUSAI para comprar lamina galvanizada y polines y así solventar su problema lo antes posible.
texts.en: Cristina, 56 years old, is an entrepreneurial woman. She supports her spouse with their household expenses by purchasing chickens to fatten up and then sell. She and her spouse are very hardworking but need to redo the roof of their home because it is in poor condition. It is for this reason that she is requesting this loan from FUSAI, so that she can purchase galvanized sheeting and purlins in order to solve this problem as soon as possible.

loans.use: to buy galvanized sheeting and purlins to redo her roof.

loans.name: Banco Mujer Shawak Group

texts.es:
Irma es una mujer con 33 años de edad, soltera y tiene 4 hijos. Es jefa de hogar. Trabajadora y con ganas de crecer y superarse. Tiene dos hijos que cursan la primaria y dos la secundaria. Cuenta con una hectárea de terreno en donde va a sembrar nuevamente su cultivo de plátano, debido a que hubo un incendio forestal y su finca fue perjudicada. Se enteró de los servicios que ofrece Fundación Mujer por medio de una integrante de otro grupo, de ahí se organizaron y formaron el nuevo banco mujer llamado "SHAWAK" en idioma bribri, el cual significa hormigas trabajadoras. Ellas se identifican con éste nombre porque son señoras organizadas de la misma comunidad que trabajan mano a mano para ayudarse entre si en sus fincas con la mano de obra, debido a que ésta por lo general es cara.
Junto con Irma hay seis integrantes más que conforman éste banco mujer y van invertir en actividades productivas comerciales y agrícolas de plátano y banano.
texts.en:
Irma is a 33-year-old woman who is single and has four children. She is the head of her household. She is hardworking and always seeks to grow and improve herself. She has two children who are in primary school, while the other two are in secondary school. 

Irma has a hectare of land where she is going to replant her plantain crops, because there was a forest fire and her whole field was damaged. She heard about the services offered by Fundación Mujer by way of a member of another group. From there, they got together and created a new women's group called "Shawak" in the Bribri language, which means "worker ants". The members identify with this name because they are organized women from the same community who work hand in hand to help each other with the manual labour in their fields, since this is generally expensive.

Along with Irma, this women's group is made up of six members. They will invest in productive commercial and agricultural activities involving plantains and bananas.

loans.use: to buy seeds and fertilizer.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to purchase agricultural inputs for her maize and bean crops.

loans.name: Trinidad

texts.es:
La socia Trinidad se sigue dedicando al negocio de venta de leña, la socia trabaja desde las 8:00 a.m hasta las 6:00 p.m, la socia ya tiene varios años en este negocio y le va muy bien, el sueño de la socia es tener un local donde pueda vender la leña. La socia solicita el crédito para comprar leña.

La socia está feliz por el préstamo y se compromete a cumplir con los pagos de su cuota.
texts.en: Trinidad is still selling firewood, working from 8am until 6pm. She has been working for several years in this business now and it is going very well, but her dream is to have somewhere where she can sell the firewood. The member is asking for a loan to buy firewood and promises to complete repayments.

loans.use: to buy firewood.

loans.name: Edwin

texts.en:
Edwin is 52 years old; he is married with two children. 

He will use his Kiva loan to cover labor costs and buy fertilizer during rice production; he needs to buy fertilizer in order to increase his production. 

With profits from his farming, he wishes to invest in his business so that in the future he can acquire machines and tractors that will enhance his farming capacity.

loans.use: to cover labor costs and buy fertilizer during rice production.

loans.name: Esequiel Efrain

texts.es: Esequiel es un humilde trabajador que con dificultades logro cursar el quinto grado de primaria, hace unos meses enfrento un duro golpe, la muerte de su padre a quien apoyaba económicamente, Esequiel tiene dos hijos los cuales trabajan para aportar en los gastos del hogar, mientras él se dedica al comercio de refrescos y golosinas ambulante en el mercado por el cual solicita el crédito para invertir en variedades que le permita continuar con las ventas ya que solamente de esta manera mantiene sus ingresos fijos con los que paga sus gastos, debido a la situación difícil del país con pocas oportunidades de empelo para salir adelante.
texts.en: Esequiel is a humble worker who, with difficulties, studied up to the fifth grade. A few months ago, he suffered a blow with the death of his father, who also supported him financially. Esequiel has two children who work to contribute to household expenses, whilst he sells soft drinks and candy at a market. For this reason, he is asking for a loan to invest in different things that will allow him to continue in this business as this is the only way he can guarantee a fixed income to pay his expenses, due to the difficult situation in his country with little employment opportunities.

loans.use: to buy boxes of purified water, soda drinks, energy drinks, gatorade and candy.

loans.name: Daisy

texts.en:
Daisy works hard to support her family. Daisy is married and has a furniture shop business in the Philippines.

She requested a PHP 10,000 loan through NWTF to purchase additional materials like wood, nails, paints, etc. 

Daisy has been in this business for 15 years now.

In the future, she would like to build and expand her business to secure the financial stability of her family.

loans.use: to purchase additional materials like wood, nails, paints, etc.

loans.name: Julia Santos

texts.es: Julia de 49 años de edad vive con su esposo y su hijo de 14 años de edad. Ella es una mujer trabajadora quien se gana la vida trabajando en la recolección de desechos sólidos cerca de su vivienda. Ella esta solicitando un crédito a FUSAI para comprar  dos ventanas y una puerta, pues las que tiene actualmente ya están deterioradas y desea dar mayor seguridad a su familia y a sus pocas pertenencias.
texts.en: Julia, 49, lives with her husband and her 14 year old son. She is a working woman who collects solid waste around her home. She is asking FUSAI for a loan to buy two windows and a door as the ones she currently has are worn and damaged and she would like to provide a better security for her family and their few belongings.

loans.use: to buy a door and two windows for her home.

loans.name: Glenn

texts.en:
Glenn is a 29-year-old micro-entrepreneur from Silang, Cavite, Philippines. He is married to Melanie, who works as a vendor, and they have four children. His three children are in grade school, while the youngest is not yet attending school. He and his wife are working hard to provide for their family.

Glenn maintains a tricycle business. He owns and drives one unit of Tricycle (motorcycle with a sidecar) that carries up to four passengers to their destination within the community. He starts working early in the morning, until late in the evening. There are times when he drives in the late evening until the wee hours in order to have a bigger profit. His regular customers are his neighbors and the local community. He earns a minimum of Php 500 in his transportation business every day.

To help him continue operations of his business, he is requesting an amount of Php 8,000 for his loan. He will be using the loan to buy motorcycle parts for the maintenance of his Tricycle unit. He has to maintain his unit in good condition in order to have a regular income for the daily needs of his family. 

Glenn dreams of having another unit of Tricycle, and hopes to give all his children a good life and education. He meets up with his co-fellowship* members to share stories of his work every week and where he can also draw strength and inspiration from the Word of God he studies.

* All CCT community partners/clients are organized into fellowship groups that meet on a weekly basis. A fellowship group is composed of 15 to 30 community partners. The fellowship groups gather each week to study the Word of God, build social capital, and repay microfinance loans.

loans.use: To pay for the spare parts and maintenance of their Tricycle unit.

loans.name: M. Asim

texts.en:
M. Asim, aged 25 years, is a responsible father of a daughter. He has been running his business for many years; in fact he owns a small tailoring shop. He takes orders from boutique owners and sews ladies clothing on order. 

His shop is situated near his house in the area of Lahore, Pakistan. One of his brothers and a few hired tailors help him sew clothing. In this way, not only is he is generating little income for his family, but he also employs others. 

He belongs to a middle class family, but due to low earnings, he is unable to provide a better living standard to his siblings, parents, and his own family, as a major portion of the income get divided among the tailors, and profit margins are not very high. He has been facing a tough time due to low income, so he has decided to expand his current enterprise. 

He does not want to sew the garments on order because the contractors criticize and find drawbacks in his completed orders.  Therefore, he has decided to establish his own boutique, to buy a professional sewing machine and an over lock machine for sewing garments and directly selling to the customers. 
  
Therefore, M. Asim has requested a Kiva loan through Brac Pakistan so he can be establish a boutique, can buy a professional sewing machine, an over lock machine, and fabric for sewing garments. 

He seems happy after receiving the loan, and thanks Kiva and field partner, Brac Pakistan.

loans.use: To buy the necessary machinery and equipment garments to establish a boutique

loans.name: Violet

texts.en:
Violet is a widow living in Hoima, Uganda. She has a retail shop, and sells eggs, sugar, and matchboxes, among other items.

She is a hard working lady who desires to expand her business, though limited capital and price fluctuations hinder her dream of business expansion.

She is acquiring a loan to buy more eggs,sugar, and salt to sell.

loans.use: to buy more eggs, sugar, and salt to sell.

loans.name: Evangeline

texts.en:
Evangeline is a hardworking entrepreneur who has a business selling herbal medicine in the Philippines. She is borrowing 30,000 PHP through NWTF to purchase additional inventory of herbal medicine to sell for her business.

Evangeline has been in this business for 15 years. She earns more income from selling rice.

She has been sustaining her business activities through her own efforts, with the help of the loans from NWTF. She dreams to save money to expand her business in the future.

loans.use: to purchase herbal medicine to sell

loans.name: Marvin Antonio

texts.es: Marvin es padre de dos hijos a quienes mantiene gracias a su empleo como guarda de seguridad, ha tenido algunas dificultades por problemas de salud, pero gracias a Dios ya está mejor para su familia, solicita el crédito para continuar con las mejoras de su vivienda la cual viene realizando poco a poco ya que sus ingresos no le permite hacer tal gasto de una sola vez, con este financiamiento comprara 16 mts de cerámica para ver más bonita su casa y ofrecer confort a su familia.
texts.en: Marvin is a father to two children whom he supports thanks to his work as a security guard. Marvin has had some health problems but, thanks to God, he is now better to look after his family. Marvin is applying for this loan in order to continue making improvements to his home. He has been working on his home little by little as his income does not allow him to have one large spend in one go. Marvin will use this 16 metres of ceramics to make his house prettier and more comfortable for his family.

loans.use: to buy ceramic and pay labourers.

loans.name: Sandra Elizabeth

texts.es: Sandra tiene  21 años de edad y vive con su hijo de 2 años de edad. Ella es una mujer muy trabajadora  quien se esfuerza mucho y esta sacando adelante a su hijo por medio de la  venta de variedad de verduras en el mercado central. Ella está solicitando un préstamo a FUSAI para comprar ladrillo de piso, arena, cemento y pagar mano de obra para encementar el piso de la vivienda dado que actualmente es de tierra lo cual  provoca insalubridad  a su hijo. Espera poder contar con dicho financiamiento y así dar inicio a la mejora lo antes posible.
texts.en: Sandra is 21 years old and lives with her two-year-old son. Sandra is a very hard-working woman who puts in a lot of effort and is helping her son to prosper by selling vegetables at the market in the centre of town. Sandra is applying for a loan from "FUSAI" in order to buy flooring  bricks, sand, and cement, and to pay labourers to cement the floor in her home. The current floor is just earth and this is dirty for her son. Sandra hopes to receive this loan so as to start the work as soon as possible.

loans.use: to buy flooring  bricks, sand, and cement, and to pay labourers to cement the floor in her home.

loans.name: Digna Isabel

texts.es: Digna de 35 años de edad vive con su esposo y sus dos hijos de 3 y 10 años de edad. Su patio tiene piso de tierra y esto tiene preocupada a Digna por la insalubridad que representa para su familia por lo que solicita un préstamo a FUSAI para invertir en la  compra de cemento, grava,arena y pagar mano de obra para encementar el piso. Ella es una mujer luchadora que apoya a su familia con la economía por medio de la venta de pupusas y tamales que ella misma elabora.
texts.en: Digna is 35 years old and lives with her husband and two children, who are aged ten and three years old. Digna's patio is made just of earth and she is worried that this is not healthy for her family. As a result she is applying for a loan from "FUSAI" in order to buy gravel, cement, and sand, and to pay labourers to cement the floor. Digna is a plucky woman who is supporting her family financially through her work preparing and selling "pupusas" (stuffed tortillas) and tamales.

loans.use: to buy gravel, cement, and sand, and to pay labourers.

loans.name: Maria Livida

texts.es: Livida de 37 años de edad vive actualmente con su esposo y sus 2 hijos de 21 y 11 años de edad, su hijo mayor y su esposo le apoyan con la economía del hogar. ELla es una mujer muy trabajadora quien se  dedica a la prestación de servicios domesticos. ella solicita este crédito a FUSAI para instalar energía eléctrica en su hogar, para lo que comprara alambre, interruptores y toma corriente, ademas necesita comprar cemento, grava y arena para encementar el piso que actualmente es de tierra.
texts.en: Livida is 37 years old and lives with her husband and two children, aged 21 and 11 years old. Livida's husband and her eldest son support the household economy. Livida is a hard-working woman who makes a living as a domestic servant. She is applying for this loan from "FUSAI" in order to install electricity in her home. To do this she will buy wire, switches and plugs. Livida also needs to buy cement, gravel and sand in order to cement the floor that is currently just earth.

loans.use: to buy cement, gravel and sand to cement the floor, and to buy wire, switches and plugs to install electricity.

loans.name: Fredy

texts.es:
Fredy es un hombre de 40 años de edad soltero y sin hijos.
Su vida la comparte con su madre, ella fue la que le enseñó gran parte de la repostería con la que trabaja ahora. Fredy terminó la secundaria y por razones económicas se dedicó a colaborar a la familia en la elaboración de masitas y horneados, mediante esta labor mantiene a su madre y hermanos. También se dedica la venta de su producto, generalmente vende en los horarios de desayuno y también por las tarde a la hora del té, sus masitas son muy solicitadas en las oficinas y empresas de horario continuo. Él quiere aumentar su producción para crecer más en su mercado, por el momento necesita comprar insumos como; azúcar, harina, leche, levadura etc., por mayor para conseguir una mejor utilidad que permita a sus hermanos estudiar. Su sueño es tener una pastelería grande donde pueda servir y exponer variedades de masitas y horneados para la degustación de su público.
Es por esos motivos que Fredy solicita un préstamo para la compra de harina por mayor y con los beneficios hacer estudiar a sus hermanos.
texts.en: Fredy, 40, is a single man without any children. He shares his life with his mother who taught him most of the baking techniques he uses now. Fredy finished high school and due to financial reasons, decided to work making pastries and baking to help his mother and siblings. He also sells his products, normally during breakfast time and afternoon tea and his pastries are in great demand from offices and businesses throughout the day. He would like to improve production to grow more in the market. He currently needs to buy input products such as; sugar, flour, milk, yeast etc. to ensure a better income that will allow his siblings to study. His dream is to have a large bakery where he can serve and show people his various different pastries and baked goods. It is for these reasons that Fredy is asking for a loan: to buy wholesale flour and use the profits to help his siblings study.

loans.use: to buy wholesale flour and use the profits to help his siblings study.

loans.name: Ligia Esperanza

texts.es: Ligia reside en una ciudad donde funciona su negocio de copias de llaves, venta de candados, chapas para puertas, llaveros y entre otros, ligia comenta que su esposo realizaba este trabajo desde que era soltero y hace 11 años que se casaron y ella también siguió con este  trabajo, a Ligia le va bien en este negocio ya que no tiene competencia, Ligia vive con su esposo y sus 3 hijos de 3, 8 y 10 años, los dos mayores asisten a la escuela,  Ligia va a invertir el crédito en la compra de mercadería para venderla en su local por el que paga arriendo, su aspiración es incrementar mercadería y ofrecer más variedad en sus productos  para así seguir adelante apoyando a sus hijos para que se eduquen correctamente.
texts.en: Ligia lives in a city where she has a business offering key cutting services, selling padlocks, locks for doors, keyrings, and more. Ligia tells us that her husband used to do this work before they were married. The couple married eleven years ago and Ligia now has the business. Things are going well for Ligia as she does not have competition. Ligia lives with her husband and three children - aged ten, eight and three years old respectively; the two eldest children are in school. Ligia is going to invest this loan in merchandise to sell at her shop (she rents the premises). Ligia aspires to increase the merchandise on offer and sell a greater variety of products in order to give her children a good education.

loans.use: to buy padlocks.

loans.name: Josephine

texts.en:
Josephine is 48 years old and married with three children. She works hard to provide for her family, running a general store in the Philippines. She has requested a 30,000 Philippines pesos (PHP) loan through NWTF to buy more stock for her store, such as soft drink, sugar and soap.

Josephine has taken out and paid back 28 loans from NWTF before this loan. She has been running the general store for 18 years and also earns an income from fattening pigs. She aspires to save enough money so she can afford to send her children to college.

loans.use: to buy more stock for her store, such as soft drinks, sugar and soap

loans.name: M. Haroon

texts.en:
M. Haroon is a 34-year-old man living in the area of Lahore, Pakistan. He owns a small crockery store, in which he sells utensils and crockery items such as plates, dishes, cups, jars, glasses, jugs, mugs, cauldrons, and buckets. 

He is a father of three children and the only person in his family who earns an income. He is the sole provider for feeding his family and paying the household expenses. He has only one source of income. He wants to buy more inventory to sell because most of his female customers purchase utensils in large quantities to make a dowry. He needs more inventory to cope with the sudden increase in the demand.

He has requested a loan from Kiva’s field partner BRAC Pakistan so he can buy utensils and crockery items to generate more income. He is very thankful to Kiva’s field partner BRAC Pakistan because they showed him a beam of hope to fulfill his dreams to provide a better standard of living for his family.

loans.use: To buy crockery items and utensils for resale

loans.name: At Kak Group

texts.en: Kak is 29 years old, married, and has two children. She is a farmer. Her husband is a construction worker in Phnom Penh. They live in Prey Veng Province, Cambodia. They can earn approximately 9 USD per day. Now she and the other members of her group would like to apply for a loan of 6,000,000 KHR to build new latrines. This loan will help her live in better conditions and avoid illnesses. In the future, she is going to build a stall to sell bacon, to renovate her house, and to support her children's university education.

loans.use: To build a latrine

loans.name: Jose Oliverio

texts.es: Jose de 48 años de edad vive en casa propia con sus cinco hijos y su esposa, el se dedica  a la agricultura y también a la albañilería con lo que obtiene de su trabajo logra solventar algunas necesidades de su hogar, él  quiere mejorar su vivienda pero con lo que obtiene no le alcanza para poder realizarlo por esa razón solicita un crédito para comprar cemento, hierro, ladrillos, arena, laminas, polines, etc. para terminar de construir las paredes y colocar el techo, y así él  y su familia puedan vivir cómodos y seguros.
texts.en: Jose, 48 years old, lives in his own house with his five children and his wife. He works in agriculture and also in construction; with what he earns from his work he manages to pay for some household necessities. He wants to improve his house but with what he earns, he doesn't have enough to be able to do it and for this reason he asks for a loan to purchase cement, iron, brick, sand, metal laminate sheeting, purlins, etc. in order to finish construction of the walls and put on a roof, so that he family can live comfortably and securely.

loans.use: to purchase cement, iron, bricks, sand, metal laminate sheeting, purlins, etc.

loans.name: Teresa De Jesus

texts.es: Teresa de 56 años de edad vive con un hijo mayor de edad y dos hijas de 16 y 14 años de edad. Ella es madre soltera y se gana la vida por medio de la venta de variedad de ropa de forma ambulante, su hijo mayor le apoya en los gastos del hogar. Esta  emprendedora mujer esta solicitando un crédito a FUSAI para encementar el patio de su vivienda ya que es de tierra y de desea dar mejores condiciones habitacionales a su familia. Además, desea reparar el techo de la vivienda dado que se encuentra deteriorado. Con el monto solicitado comprará: cemento, arena, grava, lámina galvanizada y madera.
texts.en: Teresa, 56 years old, lives with an adult son and two daughters, ages 16 and 14. She is a single mother and earns her living by selling a variety of clothing as a street vendor. Her older son helps her with the household expenses. This enterprising woman is asking for a loan from FUSAI to cement the patio of her house since it is dirt and she wants to provide better living conditions for her family. In addition, she wants to repair the roof of the house since it is in poor condition. With the amount she requests, she will purchase cement, sand, stone, galvanized metal sheeting, and wood.

loans.use: to purchase cement, sand, stone, galvanized metal sheeting, and wood to repair the roof of the house and cement the floor.

loans.name: Joy

texts.en:
Joy is 49 years old, married, and has four children.

She works hard to provide for her family. She runs a business selling charcoal in the Philippines. She requested a 10,000 PHP loan through NWTF to purchase additional sacks of charcoal to sell.

Joy has borrowed and paid 12 loans from NWTF before this loan. She has been running the charcoal business for 10 years and also earns an income from selling herbal medicine.

Joy aspires to save money to expand her business.

loans.use: to purchase additional sacks of charcoal to sell

loans.name: Zoila Margarita

texts.es: Zoila de 34 años de edad es una persona  trabajadora y responsable, vive en casa propia con su grupo familiar, ella se dedica  elaboración de quesos y adicional a eso también a la venta de tortillas, desde hace varios años posee mucha clientela por la calidad del producto y por los buenos precios, Zoila solicita un crédito para comprar leche por mayor para seguir con la elaboración de queso ya que esa es su única fuente de ingresos y asi poderle dar a su familia un mejor nivel de vida.
texts.en: Zoila, 34 years old, is a hard-working and responsible person. She lives in her own house with her family. She works making cheeses and in addition she also sells tortillas. For a number of years she has had a large customer base due to the quality of the product and her good prices.
